title: Termination of membership
context: [ยง88-340] Termination of membership. Except as otherwise provided by section 88-341, any class H member absent from service for four calendar years following the calendar year in which the member&rsquo;s employment terminated shall cease to be a member. Any class H member who withdraws the member&rsquo;s contributions, becomes a retirant, or dies, shall cease to be a member as of the date of withdrawal, retirement, or death. [L 2004, c 179, pt of ยง1]
